Git Commit.command: read -p 'Enter commit message: ' msg && git commit -m "$msg"

Git Checkout.command: read -p 'Enter branch name: ' branch && git checkout "$branch"

Git Merge.command: read -p 'Enter branch to merge: ' branch && git merge "$branch"

Git Clone.command: read -p 'Enter repository URL: ' url && git clone "$url"

Git Rebase.command: read -p 'Enter branch to rebase: ' branch && git rebase "$branch"
